content: this is a simple and beautiful flower pattern done in only 5 rounds not only does this contain the pattern for the flower it also contains 5 different ways you can use the flower with picture descriptions bookmark penholder shawl brooch jar cover wall hanger but wait there is also a bonus in there created by crochetedbytess to further develop the flower you can use any yarn scrap yarn is perfect for this and hook to match your yarn i used isla dk from sublime/sirdar couldn t find it on ravelry find a step by step tutorial on youtube through this link https //youtu be/e0ifssfrkki #crochetingkay #thefab5flower
